title: What happened to the server?
body: I was just playing a normal game a while age, all of a sudden, everyone experienced a lag in the game, and i disconnected to the game. I tried to reconnect, but it just kept telling me that my network have issues. I attempted to login my account several times, and the game was just gone, it didn't even allow me to reconnect anymore.

replies.body: i did too but i had it in rank and no one got loss prevention FUCK RIOT piece of shit at least some admin can reply fk cunts
